name: IT Engineering Manager (Relocation)
description:
A Dubai based startup in the PropTech industry is looking for an Engineering Manager.

Founded in 2020 by an ex Engineer from Uber (and Microsoft) and a graduate from San Francisco university the company is growing 40%+ every month currently reaching 100 team members.

The start-up has just raised one of the largest seed rounds in MENA, receiving investments from Amir Farha (Cotu), B&Y Ventures, Plug and Play and has applied for the next round.

They have attracted the brightest talent from Revolut, Loft, Nubank and actively expanding their team beyond the borders.

As a manager, you will be prioritizing, setting the expectations for the business while operating in a dynamic environment. You will be hiring the best engineering talent, retaining great engineering talent and making sure that the team is producing great results while keeping the morale high.

This position requires relocation to Dubai.

Responsibilities:

  • Maintain the health and morale of the team;

  • Run the standup and sprint plan and work with the product team to make sure the tasks are assigned properly between people in the engineering;

  • Have regular 1:1s with the team and make sure there is a good and honest communication channel with people about great feedback and areas of improvement;

  • Review the code along with senior engineers and make sure the team is producing good quality results;

  • Hire the best engineers by having best hiring practices.

Requirements:

  • 7+ years of experience in Software engineering, out of which 2+ in leading / mentoring Backend engineering teams (Python Django);

  • Experience with relational / non-relational DB (Postgres, Mongo, others);

  • Knowledge of best CI / CD Practices;

  • Experience with Cloud Technologies, AWS preferred;

  • Experienced with Agile Methodologies;

  • Experience working & collaborating with cross-functional teams (Product & Engineering, Design, Data, etc) player;

  • High EQ - Knows how to handle conflict and mentor engineers;

  • Experience hiring strong Backend / FS engineers before;

  • Strong & Effective communication skills in English.

Conditions:

  • Relocation to Dubai;

  • Paid vacation and sick days;

  • Equity options.
